Name: Spectrum
About the game: If you love colours, you'll love Spectrum: a relaxing colour sorting game in three dimensions which tests your skill in matching tints, shades, value and hue. The Challenge: to re-assemble the cube, putting each block in its place between the corners. You'll never play the same cube twice! Features: Infinite levels Tools: Build Frame, Pop, Scooch Save progress Eject any misplaced blocks Search through the floating blocks with vortex Mistakes can be easy to find with an outline option Compatible with Razer Chroma keyboards. VR gameplay coming soon
Meta Title: Spectrum: Mar 1, 2022, HegyLabs and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Spectrum? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2022), developer insights from HegyLabs, and a complete game summary.
